name: Evenlift
description: EvenLift improves gym retention and monetization through a digital personal trainer who counts your reps, corrects your form, and tracks your progress using AI-enabled, wall-mounted cameras alongside a mobile app.
one_liner: EvenLift improves gym retention and monetization through a digital personal trainer who counts your reps, corrects your form, and tracks your progress using AI-enabled, wall-mounted cameras alongside a mobile app.
